beer.beer_description: Brewed with Pizza Port beer, this is a 10.5% hop monster of an IPA using almost every US hop we had in our inventory. The result was a highly drinkable balanced beer with a tropical fruits on the nose and the finish.

items.badge_description: You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: This is one of the most memorable brews ever made. What an IPA.
